translations: n.剧本；歌词集（libretto 的变形）

phrs.translation: 歌剧脚本, 剧本, 唱词, 歌词

sentences.sentence: No changes in text of librettos.
And needless to say, I would love to be of assistance in translating opera librettos.
sentences.translation: 不用说，我也愿意协助翻译京剧唱词。

sentences.sentence: All four librettos reprinted with a different typeface (which I feel is more readable) for stage directions.
sentences.translation: 四个译本分别采用不同的字体刊登（我认为这样会更具可读性）。
